name: Neexa AI
author: Campaignity's Neexa.AI

sections.description:
This plugin seamlessly integrates Neexa.AI’s 24/7 AI Powered Sales Agent/Assistant onto any WordPress site. Please note that the functionality of this plugin relies on Neexa.AI, a third-party service.

Disclosure:
By using this plugin, you acknowledge and agree that certain data may be transmitted to Neexa.AI for the proper functioning of the AI Sales Agent/Assistant. This includes but is not limited to user interactions, conversations, and related data.

Third-Party Service Information

To ensure transparency, we provide the following details about the third-party service:

  • Service Provider: Neexa.AI
  • Service URL: Neexa.AI
  • Terms of Use: Neexa.AI Terms of Use
  • Privacy Policy: Neexa.AI Privacy Policy
sections.faq:
Does it show right away?

Yes, as long as the setup AI Agent/Assistant corresponds to one in your Neexa AI dashboard.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • This is the initial version and allows for setting AI Agent ID
